sentences.en: Ancient tombs are main targets for archaeological investigation and excavation.
sentences.cn: 古代墓葬为考古调查发掘的主要对象.

sentences.en: Angkor is one of the most important archaeological sites in South - East Asia.
sentences.cn: 吴哥窟区是东南亚最重要的考古学遗址之一.

sentences.en: Archaeological finds have a diameter of 18 centimeters per cent milk mirror.
sentences.cn: 出土文物中有一件直径18厘米的百乳镜.

sentences.en: Archaeological finds have been made one after another.
Here the environmental and archaeological survey data come together in intriguing ways.
sentences.cn: 这里,环境调查数据和考古调查数据错综复杂.

sentences.en: His paper was published in the proceedings of the Kent Archaeological Society.
sentences.cn: 他的论文已在肯特考古学会学报上发表.

sentences.en: In particular, he said they had been influenced by the discovery of a crucified skeleton, which was found near Jerusalem in 1968 and is the only such archaeological find.
sentences.cn: 他特别指出他们受到一具被钉死的骨架的影响，这具骨架在1968年出土于耶路撒冷附近，并且是这方面唯一的考古学发现。

sentences.en: It exhibits archaeological findings in the field of ancient mining and metallurgy.
sentences.cn: 展览展出了古代采矿、冶金领域里的考古发现.

sentences.en: Just who made the tools is unclear from the archaeological evidence alone, though our relative Homo erectus is identified as the likely creator of at least the Acheulian tools.
sentences.cn: 尽管已经确定我们的近亲直立人至少是阿舍利工具可能的创造者，但仅凭考古学证据还无法确定是谁制造了这些工具。

sentences.en: Most of the important archaeological finds in this part of the world have been discovered accidently.
sentences.cn: 世界上这个地区的重要考古发现大都是偶然获得的.

sentences.en: Recent extensive construction has resulted in unearthing of many valuable archaeological remains.
sentences.cn: 最近广泛施工,促使很多珍贵的古物出土了.

sentences.en: So there are two other models, then, models different from the immigration model, two other models for understanding the formation of Israel, that build on this archaeological evidence.
sentences.cn: 那么还有两个其他的模型，与移民模型不同的两个模型，这两个模型也是为了说明以色列的形成，它们是依据考古学证据。

sentences.en: That was a great archaeological find.
sentences.cn: 那是一次了不起的考古发现.

sentences.en: The area is a treasure house of archaeological relics.
sentences.cn: 这个地区是古文物遗迹的宝库。

sentences.en: The discovery is of great archaeological value.
sentences.cn: 这一发现有很大的考古学意义.

sentences.en: The results help explain the contradiction between the archaeological find.
sentences.cn: 这一结果有助于解释考古学发现间的矛盾.

sentences.en: The University will conduct an archaeological dig with up to 30 students.
sentences.cn: 大学将组织一次有30名学生参与的考古挖掘.

sentences.en: The work fills (in) a gap which has hitherto existed in our archaeological literature.
sentences.cn: 这部著作填补了我国考古学文献中的一个空白。

sentences.en: Tourists have plundered all the archaeological sites.
sentences.cn: 游客简直是洗劫了考古场地.
